1.0.name: wordpress/google-adsense-for-responsive-design-gard
1.0.description:
GARD allows you to easily place Google AdSense in your website's content via the use of the shortcode [GARD].

Set up is easy, simply create AdSense ads for the different sizes that you want to use on your website, then input the AdSense google_ad_slot number into the GARD settings page next to that ads dimension. That's it!

GARD Pro extends the capabilities of GARD by allowing things like custom shortcode, auto insert GARD into posts, and a responsive widget.

Find out more about GARD Pro here.

Support: The Digital Hippies Official Wordpress Plugin Support Forums
